pages.text: If you plan to make resources like alcohol and wine, you'll need to ferment materials in a barrel and extract them via a barrel tap.$(br2)Thanks to cutting edge technologies (and developer laziness), this process of fermentation is instant.
Recipes for items that use the barrel tap can be found on the following page.

$(l)Bottle of Alcohol$()$(br2)Place at least 16 wheat in one stack inside a barrel, and right-click the tap with an empty bottle.$(br2)$(l)Bottle of Wine$()$(br2)Place at least 16 sweet berries in one stack inside a barrel, and right-click the tap with an empty bottle.
